segments.text: Good afternoon , Mrs . Brown . I've come to see Mr . Brown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but he's not in , he's gone out on business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! I just drop in on him for a chat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please come in for a cup of coffee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . Please tell him to phone me when he comes back .
segments.speaker: S1
